question.xref: DES s10, HC r2, HC r206
question.text: The left-hand pavement is closed due to street repairs. What should you do?

explanation.text: Where street repairs have closed off pavements, proceed carefully and slowly as pedestrians might have to walk in the road.

answer.text: Watch out for pedestrians walking in the road
Use your right-hand mirror more often
Speed up to get past the roadworks quicker
Position close to the left-hand kerb
